134613973375842.description:
Skylyne Models Fundraiser

2014 Avon Walk for Breast Cancer

Washington, DC

The more of us that walk, the more of us that can survive!

Walking from the Washington Monument Grounds to Meadowbrook Park and Back Again

The walk route to and from the Washington Monument Grounds and Wellness Village will consist mostly of sidewalks and city streets. The 2-day route will give you a glimpse into some of our Nation’s Capitol’s most exciting sites, like the Jefferson Memorial and the Martin Luther King, Jr. Memorial!

The route itself will be clearly marked with directional signage and other markings. This is how you will navigate the route during the event — by following the signs.

There is also a route support team called "the Sweep Team," which is available to help you while you are on the road between Quick Stops and Rest Stops. Overall, the route will take you through some of Washington, DC’s most beautiful neighborhoods, and is designed to be safe, fun, and interesting!

CEREMONIES - WASHINGTON MONUMENT GROUNDS
Washington Monument Grounds
15th St. NW and Constitution Ave. NW
Washington, DC 20001
MAP 

Opening: May 3, 2014 | Walker Arrival 5:30-6:00 A.M. | Ceremony Begins 6:30 A.M. 
 

For more information or to volunteer, contact Mark @ 443/562/4551

135262296648926.description:
The National Conference of State Societies is inviting children under 13 to serve as the Junior Court to the Cherry Blossom Princesses.   This includes a presentation at The Official Coronation of the 2014 US Cherry Blossom Queen & 102nd Anniversary Cherry Blossom Grand Ball 

There is a waiver form for the Junior Cherry Blossom Princess Program that MUST be completed by March 5th to participate as a Jr Princess - Cherry Blossom Junior Princess Participation Form - http://www.statesocieties.org/PrincessProgram.aspx 

In order for a young lady to participate in the Junior Princess Program:
• She must be at least 5 years old – however, no older than 13 years old (per the pricing structure for our events)
• She must have her parent/guardian with her at all times. NOTE: adult fees for paid events are not covered in the Jr. Princess fee. 
• Payment of the $100 participation fee required (check made payable to:  The National Conference of State Societies) 
• Sashes will be issued on Saturday, April 5, 2014, at a tea following the event at the Library of Congress. Additional details will be sent to you shortly.

Participation in the program includes:
• Junior Princess sash with the year – embroidered
• Event at the Library of Congress – Saturday, April 5, 2014
•Admission for the Junior Princess to the Junior Princess Tea/Presentation event – Saturday, April 5, 2014
• Acknowledgement at events of the Junior Princesses present
•Special child pricing for all the events

The Junior Cherry Blossom Princess Program as highlghted on http://www.statesocieties.org/PrincessProgram.aspx 
This new program began in 2012 is our Junior Cherry Blossom Princess Program. This was in the pilot stages for 2 years and it was officially launched in 2012. The Junior Princess Program allows sisters of princesses, our Princess Alumnae families and members of state and territorial societies to participate in the ticketed activities as well.  As a special addition, they are individually introduced for the first time at the Princess Tea where they receive their sash.  They were able to participate in the USO Care Package Stuffing event at Ft. Belvoir in 2012, visited the Children's Museum in 2013 and are always collectively recognized as a group at each of the NCSS events.  
 
State and Territorial Societies can have more than one Junior Cherry Blossom Princess, it is not limited. The beginning age is 5 so she can walk on stage independently to receive her sash.  The ending age is 13 years old (per the pricing structure for our events).  This year, Junior Princessses will receive their sashes at a tea following a public Library of Congress event on Saturday, April 5, 2014.  Stay tuned for other special events involving the Junior Princesses during the Festival week and make sure to take advantage of the special pricing at the NCSS events for children, including our Junior Princesses.  

The Official Coronation of the 2014 US Cherry Blossom Queen & 102nd Anniversary Cherry Blossom Grand Ball - will be April 11th. This highly anticipated, historic annual black-tie affair is a treasured Washington rite of spring! The evening starts with a traditional sushi reception and silent auction, followed by an elegant dinner with entertainment. We are inviting children to serve as the Junior Court to the Princesses at the ball. If there are any questions, please contact us at: ncssinquiries@gmail.com and AllisonPriebeBrooks@gmail.com 

Most Sincerely,
Allison Priebe Brooks & Lorraine Nordlinger
Junior Princess Co-Chairs
 
*Please feel free to view our photos from last year's Ball as we were piloting the Junior Princess program: 
http://www.facebook.com/album.php?aid=2691188&id=4927256
2012 - Ball Fesitval Week - https://www.facebook.com/#!/queenbeebuzz/media_set?set=a.10101188014236790.3075069.4927256&type=3
 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Official Coronation of the 2014 US Cherry Blossom Queen & 102nd Cherry Blossom Grand Ball 
Capping the NCSS week of activities during the Centennial Celebration of the Gift of Trees, is the coronation of the 2014 U.S. Cherry Blossom Queen from the U.S. Cherry Blossom Princesses. Begin this elegant black-tie affair with a sushi reception, hosted by the Japan Sushi Association, Mu Sake, and Sapporo Beer, along with a Silent Auction, in the Grand Foyer of the Ballroom. When the doors open, you will proceed inside the Grand Ballroom for 3-course dinner, the presentation of the Cherry Blossom Princesses, the crowning of the Cherry Blossom Queen and an evening of dancing. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The National Conference of State Societies cordially invites you to The Annual Grand Ball, Sushi Reception with Japanese chefs flown in especially for the event and Silent Auction on Friday, April 11, 2014 at the Renaissance Washington DC Downtown Hotel. The lavish event is the highlight of the National Cherry Blossom Festival and honors the 2014 State Society Cherry Blossom Princesses.
 
Friday, April 11 – Official Cherry Blossom Grand Ball and US Cherry Blossom Queen Coronation
6:00 p.m. Registration, Sushi Reception and Silent Auction 
7:00 p.m. Dinner and Program.
Live music, dancing and socializing till past midnight

Renaissance Washington DC Downtown Hotel
 999 9th Street, NW
 Washington D.C., 20001
 Reserved seating: $175.00/adults; $75.00/children under 12; *Black Tie Suggested 
 
Official Coronation of the 2014 United States Cherry Blossom Queen & Cherry Blossom Grand Ball, along with a Sushi Reception will be held at the Renaissance Washington, DC Hotel, 999 9th Street, NW. The evening begins with the sushi reception, where guests will enjoy complementary Sapporo Beer and Sake from Yaegaki Sake & Spirits, Inc., while sampling sushi created by the master Sushi Chefs of Washington, DC. Each chef has extraordinary artful skills and will create a specialty for the guests. 

The ballroom doors will open, inviting guests to their tables for dinner with the Princesses, guests from Japan, and other dignitaries. Following dinner, the Princesses will be formally introduced during the Grand March by our Mistress of Ceremonies, Jacqui Geras, ABC7/WJLA, preparing them for the much anticipated crowning. One Princess will become the 2014 U.S. Cherry Blossom Queen with the ceremonial crowning of the spectacular Mikimoto Crown, a priceless Japanese work of art.  A gift from Mikimoto Co. Ltd., a smaller replica Crown and strand of Mikimoto pearls are presented to the 2014 U.S. Cherry Blossom Queen as a special keepsake.  

The evening rounds out with our guests dancing to the sounds of Big Band Caliente, as well as a DJ later in the evening with all the top-40 hits. 

Valet Parking is available on the premises, along with garage parking or lot parking across the street. ( Metro Accessible)

About this group:
The Latin rock group Jarabe de Palo (strictly translated as "wood syrup" in English) was formed in Barcelona in the early '90s by vocalist and guitarist Pau Donés with guitarist Jordi Mena, drummer Alex Tenas, percussionist Dani Forcada and bassist Joan Gené. Donés, an early fan of the Beatles and Bob Marley, formed his first band with his brother, but then found another lineup for the newly named Jarabe de Palo. The group's 1997 album La Flaca did well on the charts in the group's native land. De Vuelta Y Vuelta was issued four years later.

Jarabe de Palo's Biography: http://www.allmusic.com/artist/jarabe-de-palo-mn0000214553/biography

!Thank you y gracias!

Eduardo David --

1378858235702916.description:
www.booster.com/yearofthecure

Connor was diagnosed with the number one genetic killer of infants, Spinal Muscular Atrophy type 1 at the age of 3.5 months old. Connor was not expected to survive passed 6 months of age.

Connor is now 17 months old and is still fighting! He is beating the odds every day! 90% of children with his diagnosis do not survive passed the age of 2 years old.

There is no cure or treatment for SMA, and that is where we need YOUR help! Help us make 2014 the Year of the Cure!

Connor and his family were granted a newly diagnosed scholarship from Families of SMA to attend their very first SMA conference. They are so excited to be able to meet other families, and can't wait for Connor to meet tons of strong little kids just like him! The scholarship covers the registration fees for the conference but the family still needs to drive from Michigan to Washington D.C. with Connor and all of his equipment. They will also need to stay for several days. Everything helps, the Smith's are so happy they have been granted this opportunity, but still have many financial obligations with a child in Connor's condition.

This fundraiser is to help the Smith's get to the FSMA conference, the rest of the monies raised will be donated to funding SMA research at the FSMA conference in June.

Help us #CureSMA!
1378858235702916.name: Help Connor Get To Washington D.C And Fight For A Cure!!

1382007848736695.description:
There's no better way to kickstart the year here in the nation's capital then with a better understanding of the impact the Indian culture has had on our country.

Join YJP as we take a tour of "Beyond Bollywood: Indian Americans Shape the Nation" at the National Museum of Natural History with Smithsonian Curator Masum Momaya.  

Join us at this 5000 sq. ft., first-of-its-kind exhibition, as we explore how Indian immigrants and Indian Americans have shaped the United States culturally, politically and professional since the first Indians set foot on American soil in 1790.  

Afterward, we can continue this fascinating conversation over brunch at Teaism Penn Quarter, only a short walk from the museum.  The museum visit and tour are free.  Feel free to join for both, and bring your friends!  We'll gather in the Constitution Avenue lobby of the museum at 10:15am.  The tour begins at 10:30am sharp, so don't be late! Both places are metro accessible, the National Museum of Natural History can be accessed using blue/orange lines to Federal Triangle, and Teaism Penn Quarter can be accessed using yellow/green lines to Navy Memorial – Archives.

If you would like to learn more about the exhibit, please see the link below.

http://www.si.edu/Exhibitions/Details/Beyond-Bollywood-Indian-Americans-Shape-the-Nation--4689

Register today and please contact our Local Representative, Masum Momaya, if you have any questions.  She can be reached directly at 815-608-2620.

When: Reception from 6-7:15, Reading at 7:15

Where: LL-7 (lower level reading hall), Johns Hopkins DC Washington Center, 1717 Massachusetts Ave, NW, Wash DC 20036, about two blocks from Dupont Circle

Metro: Dupont Circle South

This event is free and open to the public, so please feel free to share widely! We will have books for sale.  

****

A little about the book: Answers I’ll Accept: True Accounts of Online Dating is a book of personal essays about online dating edited by published author Kelly Ann  Jacobson. Including both the strange and the beautiful–a Halloween warehouse party, a German soul mate, a date who does cocaine, a drunken offering to Yemanja, and of course, a lot of weddings–Answers I’ll Accept has a story for everyone. 

Authors: Brandi Dawn Henderson, Diana Smith Bolton, Melanie Lynn Griffin, Ellen Appleby, Gabrielle Lee, Faye Rivkin, Jessica Barksdale, Frances Carden, Melani Robinson, Jean Kim, Samantha Solomon, Jason Shand, Margot Bigg, Jason S., and Erin P.T. Canning

1397695533816248.description:
15 de enero de 2014 

Fundación Juvenil de América
por la Democracia y el Desarrollo Multilateral
 
 
FUNJADEM
 
 
 
Santo Domingo, D.N.
14 de enero 2014
Luz de Esperanza en América
 
GRUPO MOEA 2014
 
WASHINGTON MODEL GENERAL ASSEMBLY OF THE ORGANIZATION
OF AMERICAN STATES (WMOAS) 
                                                                        
Convocatoria para Participar y Representar a la República Dominicana, en el Modelo de la Asamblea General de la Organización de Estados Americanos (MOEA). 
 
 
 
 
La Fundación Juvenil de América por la Democracia y el Desarrollo Multilateral (FUNJADEM), lanza de manera oficial como cada año su convocatoria para aquellos Jóvenes emprendedores caracterizados por sus grandes actitudes diplomáticas y que poseen los mejores deseos de optimizar las condiciones de vida a nivel mundial.
 
 
Esta convocatoria que hoy hacemos de conocimiento público, está encaminada para aquellos jóvenes que desean participar y representar a la República Dominicana, en el Modelo de la Asamblea General de la Organización de Estados Americanos, MOEA 2014, el cual es un programa de la Organización de los Estados Americanos (OEA) y el Instituto para el diálogo diplomático en las Américas (IDDA). Creado con el objetivo de promover los valores democráticos entre la juventud del Hemisferio, mediante un ejercicio de simulación de la auténtica Asamblea General de la OEA. Este ejercicio familiariza a estudiantes, profesores e instituciones académicas con la labor de la Organización de Estados Americanos y con sus Estados Miembros, así como, con el papel de la Organización como el principal foro político del Hemisferio.
 
 
El MOEA es un ejercicio de simulación de las deliberaciones del Consejo Permanente de la OEA y de los períodos ordinarios de sesiones anuales de su Asamblea General, en el cual los estudiantes representan a los diplomáticos de los Estados Miembros de la OEA donde debaten resoluciones sobre los temas actuales de la Agenda Interamericana.
 
 
Estos Modelos promueven el desarrollo de liderazgo en los jóvenes, así como habilidades de negociación, trabajo en equipo y resolución de conflictos. Promueven un sólido sentido de compromiso y liderazgo, así como un compromiso con los principios de honestidad, igualdad, respeto y responsabilidad en los participantes, quienes deberán adherirse a estos principios en todas las actividades del MOEA, y promover una cultura de integridad y respeto por la diversidad.
 
 
El Programa MOEA busca involucrar el mayor número de estudiantes, mediante la organización de Modelos en cualquiera de los Estados Miembros de la OEA. Cada año aproximadamente 1500 estudiantes y más de 100 docentes del Hemisferio participan en estos Modelos. El IDDA organiza el MOEA para universidades, colegios secundarios y pasantes de la OEA. Este último proyecto es una actividad oficial del Programa de Pasantías de la OEA.  Con el objetivo de que jóvenes universitarios y profesionales puedan trabajar dentro de los campos de estudio de la Organización de Estados Americanos.
 
 
Adicionalmente, a fin de preparar a sus estudiantes para participar en estos Modelos, varias universidades en el Hemisferio han desarrollado cursos que tienen como base el MOEA. Estos cursos tratan temas relacionados con la Agenda Interamericana, Relaciones Multilaterales e Internacionales, Diplomacia, Instituciones Internacionales, entre otros.
 
 
Queremos Anunciar que FUNJADEM, Dirigida por jóvenes de diferentes Universidades y Colegios, participará en el Modelo de la Asamblea General de la Organización de Estados Americanos (MOEA) que este año se llevará a cabo en la misma sede de la OEA en la ciudad de Washington, DC, del 25 al 29 marzo en las auténticas salas de reuniones utilizadas por los representantes de los estados miembros y en las instalaciones del Hotel Fairmont de 5 estrellas.  
 
 
Como objetivo principal, nuestros jóvenes tendrán que abordar las problemáticas globales en un contexto del mundo real, esta será la misión encomendada para los jóvenes de diferentes lugares de la República Dominicana que estarán siendo seleccionados en los próximos días con la finalidad de viajar y participar  con FUNJADEM, en el Modelo de la Organización de los Estados Americanos (MOEA-2014).
 
 
Queremos recordar que el MOEA es un esfuerzo de colaboración entre la Organización de Estados Americanos y el Instituto para el Diálogo Diplomática en las Américas (IDDA), que es una entidad legalmente constituida, con el estado como una organización de la sociedad civil en la OEA, el MOEA y el apoyo activo de la Oficina del Secretario General Adjunto de la OEA y ha sido aprobado mediante una Resolución de la propia Organización de Estados Americanos. Esta colaboración única permite a los estudiantes un acceso sin precedentes a la OEA y sus misiones de los Estados miembros. Las ceremonias de apertura y clausura se celebrarán en el Salón de las Américas en la sede de la OEA en Washington, DC; estas sesiones son atendidas por los embajadores y el Secretario General de la Organización de los Estados Americanos.
 
 
Las sesiones del Comité se celebrarán en el Fairmont Hotel cerca de Georgetown. Los trabajos  asignados por La facultad MOEA, son realizados en colaboración con la Oficina del Secretario General Adjunto de la OEA para ofrecer una oportunidad realista, un reto académico y único para que los  estudiantes aprendan sobre el verdadero trabajo de la OEA y de su misión, con sus Estados miembros y  los temas importantes que enfrenta el Hemisferio. La simulación de la Asamblea General de la OEA es un evento de cinco (5) días diseñado para lograr varios objetivos, entre ellos el aprendizaje sobre las  estructuras y procesos de la propia OEA, la profundidad de aprendizaje sobre temas de actualidad que enfrenta el hemisferio o un Estado miembro de la OEA, y el arte de la diplomacia.
 
 
Nota; La FUNJADEM busca seleccionar 15 estudiantes dominicanos que dominen el idioma inglés y tengan la voluntad de representar a la República Dominicana, en el Modelo de la Asamblea General de la Organización de Estados Americanos (MOEA) que se llevará a cabo en Washington, DC, del 25 al 29 marzo 2014. 
 
 FUNJADEM: Es una organización privada sin fines de lucro, caracterizada por la Democracia y el Desarrollo Multilateral, la cual tiene por objetivos diseñar, elaborar y aplicar medidas estratégicas a través de proyectos que impulsen o proporcionen a los jóvenes de América y sus asociados, la oportunidad de poder desarrollar su liderazgo en condiciones de libertad, dignidad, e igualdad humana, sin importar categoría étnica, cultura, clase social, sexo, idioma, color y religión.
 
FUNJADEM, también es una Organización No Gubernamental, asociada a las simulaciones de Naciones Unidas y la Simulaciones de la Organización de los Estados Americanos, siempre y cuando estas no tengan fines de lucro y mucho menos tengan actitudes de corrientes elitistas, caracterizadas por la (burocracia y la oligarquía).
 
Los jóvenes seleccionados por parte de FUNJADEM, recibirán una ardua preparación académica, tendrán la oportunidad de discutir las problemáticas que atentan contra la integridad de la comunidad internacional, y por medio de la negociación multilateral, el diálogo y el debate, finalmente tendrán que llegar a un consenso y emitir una resolución tras días de debates.
 
El perfil de los y las aspirantes a ser seleccionados consiste en ser jóvenes con edad entre 18 a 28 años, estudiante de educación superior, cursos técnicos o de educación media, que actualmente estén cursando 4to de bachillerato y deberán tener un conocimiento práctico de las funciones de la OEA y de sus documentos básicos, teniendo que demostrar interés y conocimiento sobre las problemáticas mundiales. Pero en especial tener capacidad de liderazgo y trabajo en equipo; así como, para desempeñar sus funciones con responsabilidad, puntualidad, pero sobre todo tener un amplio dominio del idioma inglés.
 
Nota; Cada joven que aplique al proceso tiene que tener en cuenta que es su responsabilidad cubrir los gastos consulares, boleto aéreo después de obtener su visado y otros gastos que dependan del proceso en general. La fundación como institución sin fines de lucro entregará cartas de solicitud de patrocinio o ayuda económica para que los jóvenes puedan cubrir los gastos del proceso. 
 
 
PROCESO DE SELECCIÓN
 
Cada joven que tenga la voluntad de participar y representar a la República Dominicana con FUNJADEM en (MOEA•2014) tendrá que asistir por lo menos a una Reunión Informativa en las fechas que presentaremos a continuación, entregar todos los documentos que le sean solicitado luego de ser preseleccionado, asistir al proceso de entrevista y someterse a un largo proceso de evaluación durante varios meses.   
 
REUNIONES INFORMATIVAS
 
 
Domingo (19 de enero 2014). Se Realizará en la Plaza Simón Bolívar, Av. Máximo Gómez esq. Av. Bolívar. En Horario de 2:00 Pm hasta las 4:00 Pm de la Tarde.
 
Domingo (26 de enero 2014). Se Realizará en la Plaza Simón Bolívar, Av. Máximo Gómez esq. Av. Bolívar. En Horario de 2:00 Pm hasta las 4:00 Pm de la Tarde.
 
 
ENTREVISTAS
 
Las Entrevistas serán asignadas en orden de procedencias según el día que el Aplicante asista a la reunión informativa y luego entregue la documentación que le sea solicitada.
 
La Recepción y/o Aplicaciones de solicitudes estarán abiertas hasta el domingo 01 de febrero del año en curso y los preseleccionados, serán contactados para un proceso de entrevistas que se realizará luego de entregar su documentación.
 
Los Resultados de las entrevistas serán publicados en varios diarios de Información Pública, el miércoles 05 de febrero del 2014.
 
 
PARA PREGUNTAS Y RESPUESTAS INMEDIATA
Síguenos en Twitter: @Funjadem1
 
 
La Plaza Bolívar está ubicada en la avenida Máximo Gómez, entre las avenidas José Contreras y la Bolívar
 
 
Nota; Para cuidar la integridad moral de los Aplicantes, solo se publicará la lista con los nombres de los jóvenes que fueron seleccionados, sin otorgarle ningún valor calificativo por el potencial que muestre en su evaluación. Los Nombres de los jóvenes que no califiquen, serán reservados por nuestra institución. 
 
 
REQUISITOS DE ADMISIÓN
 
Los interesados deben enviar a la siguiente dirección de correo electrónico funjadem@hotmail.com los primeros cuatro (4) requisitos de la siguiente documentación y además del envió al correo de FUNJADEM, se deberá entregar en físico con los demás documentos el día de su entrevista con el formato de Letras Times New Román 12, Margen 3 cm y a 1.5 interlineado a 2 dos espacios. 
 
   Currículum Vitae Plastificado. 
  Una semblanza de 500 Palabras que explique de manera resumida su historia de vida académica, social, familiar y/o laborar.  
 3.  Ensayo Número uno (1) En Inglés, (500 Palabras).
 
Tema: porque usted quiere participar con FUNJADEM, en MOEA 2014 y cuáles son las razones de manera detallada que lo Motiva a regresar a República Dominicana después de participar en dicha Conferencia Internacional en Estados Unidos. 
 4.      Ensayo Número dos (2) En Inglés, (1,000 Palabras).
 
Tema: Todo lo referente al sistema de la Organización de los Estados Americanos, OEA. (Su historia, como funciona, de que se encarga y cuál es su estructura a nivel mundial).  
 
 
EN HOJA DE HILO Y ENCUADERNADO.
 
.  
Una Foto de cuerpo completo. 
   Fotocopia del Pasaporte (Opcional por el Momento). 
   Fotocopia de la Visa. (En dado caso de no tener visa nosotros gestionamos su proceso de entrevista consular para que el consulado determine si usted califica para una visa B1-B2). 
Fotocopia de su Cédula. 
 Documentación oficial que acredite los últimos estudios cursados o los que se encuentre cursando en la actualidad (curso técnico, educación media o superior).
 Carta de Buena Conducta emitida por la Procuraduría General de la República Dominicana, (Reciente).
 
No se recibirán expedientes incompletos y el Aplicante tendrá que conseguir todas las documentaciones adicionales que les soliciten las autoridades competentes de FUNJADEM, luego de su preselección para completar su proceso de selección.
 
¡Ven! Participa, Convive y Construye
 Un Espacios para la Paz.
¡Podemos Lograrlo!

1404921656439169.description:
In collaboration with the DC Environmental Film Festival the Bhutan Foundation is showing the film Happiness by Thomas Balmes and Nina Bernfeld about Bhutan and the journey of what development brings into the country. 

Please see below a description of the film: 

Peyangki is a dreamy and solitary eight-year-old monk living with his mother in the remote village of Laya in Bhutan. TV will soon come to the village. In 1999, King Jigme Wangchuck approved the use of television and Internet throughout his largely undeveloped nation known for its “gross national happiness.” With his uncle, Peyangki takes a three-day journey to the capital Thimphu to buy a TV set. Along the way, the boy discovers cars, toilets and city lights for the first time. Does TV bring happiness or will progress destroy an ancient way of life? Directed by Thomas Balmès and Nina Bernfeld. Winner, Cinematography Award for World Cinema Documentary, 2014 Sundance Film Festival.

Introduced by Dr. Bruce Bunting, President, Bhutan Foundation. The film will be followed by a Q&A session.

For more information visit: http://www.dcenvironmentalfilmfest.org/films/show/1242
1404921656439169.name: Washington, D.C. Premiere of Happiness

The DC Trashion Fashion Show, in collaboration with Evergreen Design Co., will be held Thursday, May 8th at Terminal A of Reagan National Airport, Arlington, VA from 6-9pm.
We strive to inspire through recycled design. Attendees will leave feeling more empowered and aware of recycling, reusing and reducing waste.
This event creates a direct connection for students and professionals to use clean waste from the community to create works of art – waste that would otherwise be in another landfill. Proceeds will provide scholarship funding for local children to attend The Sustainable Farm School, in support of our mission to bring sustainability education to future generations.
Terminal A will be transformed into a underwater recycled seascape thanks to local artist Nina Salazar of Studio N111, in collaboration with other artists and students.
This event is a community-driven effort to promote environmental awareness and support Hartford and the surrounding area’s local creative and arts environment.  All Trashion Fashion Shows will have zero waste thank you to our partner Sustainable America.

Features at Trashion Fashion will include: 
•	A recycled creative runway with local designers’ and artists’ fashions 
•	Designs by high school and middle school students from the DC Public Schools
•	50 models and dancers in designs that will make you rethink the way you view trash
•	Music by a local Samba band
•	Spoken word  and dance performances 
•	Terminal A in Reagan National Airport will be transformed into a underwater recycled seascape thanks to artist Nina Salazar of Studio N111, in collaboration with other artists and students.

Admission is free.
1406666396259472.name: DC Trashion Fashion Show

1417632858487557.description:
Join the National Hispanic Leadership Agenda and Political Parity at the US Capitol Visitor's Center this Monday as we launch NHLA's new Latina Task Force and bring LatinasRepresent to the nation's capital. RSVP to join us for a special free day-long summit empowering Latinas professionals in DC and at our evening reception honoring the nine Latinas in Congress! 

NOTE: This Facebook invite is for promotional purposes. Please RSVP at http://bit.ly/dcrsvp324 to attend.

ABOUT THE EVENT
LatinasRepresent is joint initiative of Political Parity (a project of the Hunt Alternatives Fund) and the National Hispanic Leadership Agenda (a coalition of the nation's 37 preeminent national Latino organizations). The special non-partisan partnership launched in February of 2014 is designed to: 
* Unite stakeholders and communities, 
* Lift up effective strategies and models of success for public service leaders, 
* Embolden Latinas to pursue public service leadership roles, and 
* Drive a national conversation about the need for a political system that fully reflects all Americans, including Latinas who are currently just 1 percent of all elected officials.

AGENDA
At 9:30 a.m. - The day will begin with registration, opening remarks, and a panel of policy experts highlighting the Latina perspective around key issues like civil rights, economic empowerment, education, health, immigration reform.

At Noon - Latina elected officials, appointees and leaders will join us for lunch to share their advice and reflections related to their personal experiences moving up the public service leadership ladder. 

From 2-4:30 p.m.- We'll have workshops to help you strengthen your skills as a Latina leader and to connect with you with a small working group of professionals to discuss how Latinas can advance the policy and leadership issues discussed during the day. 

From 5:00-7:30 p.m. - We'll wrap up the day with a special networking reception celebrating the nine Latina Members of Congress.

FEATURED SPEAKERS:
* Latina Members of Congress
* Philadelphia Councilwoman Maria Quinones-Sanchez
* Marni Allen , Director of Political Parity
* Ann Marie Benitez, Director of Government Relations and Public Affairs at the National Latina Institute for Reproductive Health
* Alejandra Ceja, Executive Director of the White House Initiative for Educational Excellence for Hispanics
* Vilma Colom, Former President National Conference of Puerto Rican Women and Former Alderman to the 35th Ward in the City of Chicago
* Felicia Escobar, Senior Policy Advisor at the White House Domestic Policy Council
* Claudia Flores, the Bridge Project
* Melody Gonzales, National Hispanic Leadership Agenda Latino Appointment Program Director
* Jessica Gonzalez-Rojas, Executive Director of the National Latina Institute for Reproductive Health
* Rosie Hidalgo, Director of Public Policy at Casa de Esperanza: National Latin@ Network
* Erin Hustings, Senior Policy Analyst with the National Association of Latino Elected and Appointed Officials (NALEO) Educational Fund
* Ignacia Moreno, Former Assistant Attorney General for the U.S. Department of Justice's Environmental and Natural Resources Division
* Hector Sanchez, Chair of the National Hispanic Leadership Agenda & Executive Director of the Labor Council for Latin American Advancement
* Patti Tototzintle, CEO of Casa de Esperanza: National Latin@ Network
. . . and other special guests!
1417632858487557.name: LatinasRepresent DC Policy & Leadership Summit

1429462950629880.description:
Favela Rising (2005, 80 min, documentary), by Jeff Zimbalist and Matt Mochary – tells the story of Anderson Sá, a former drug dealer turned community organizer, who emerged from the slums of Rio to lead the nonviolent cultural movement known as Afro-Reggae and help stop the violence and drug trafficking in his community. (Portuguese with English subtitles). (http://tinyurl.com/favela-rising-trailer)

FAVELA RISING documents a man and a movement, a city divided and a favela united. Haunted by the murders of his family and many of his friends, Anderson Sá is a former drug-trafficker who turns social revolutionary in Vigario Geral, one of Rio de Janeiro’s most feared slums. Sá establishes the grassroots AfroReggae group – ‘Grupo Cultural AfroReggae’ (AfroReggae Cultural Group). Through hip-hop music, the rhythms of the street, and Afro-Brazilian dance he rallies his community to counteract the violent oppression enforced by teenage drug armies and sustained by corrupt police.

Audience discussion will follow the screening.

Bloombars, in association with the Washington Portuguese Language Meetup, is proud to present monthly films which highlight the best of Lusophone culture.

A voluntary donation of $10 is "suggested". Proceeds support both the Washington Portuguese Language Meetup and BloomBars. Free organic popcorn.

BloomScreen Indie Film Night is a weekly series of independent and foreign films, accompanied by discussions with filmmakers, experts and other guests.
1429462950629880.name: BloomScreen & Washington DC Portuguese Meetup present: Favela Rising

1434384956806219.description:
We are silent to be heard! 

On April 6th there will be a Day of Silence for the seventh time in Russia. 

On this day, Russian LGBT take a vow of silence with their mouths taped - as a symbol of the fact that they are not allowed to speak openly about the discrimination they face - will express their silent protest against the denial of the human rights and dignity of Russian LGBT: 
at school, at institution, at the workplace, in society.

We, Russian-speaking LGBT in Washington, D.C., have decided to devote the Day of Silence in 2014 to those Russian LGBT who were silenced forever because of an ongoing campaign of harassment which began after the adoption of anti-gay laws in Russia.

We also want to recall an earlier prediction – that, once the Sochi Olympics was over, everyone would forget about Russian LGBT. And that is exactly what happened. The focus of attention has shifted to other subjects, but the discrimination and violence being faced by Russian LGBT have remained. 

The Russian people are forced to live under an authoritarian regime whose leader - Vladimir Putin - brazenly quoted Hitler in a speech before the Russian Parliament. 

We invite everyone to come with us to the White House on April 6th, where we, with our mouths taped, will express our silent protest against the denial of the human rights and dignity of Russian LGBT.
1434384956806219.name: Day of Solidarity with the Russian LGBTQ in Washington, D.C

1435074633401403.description:
Nakon uspesnog koncerta Harisa Dzinovica i svih pozitivnih komentara, dugo smo razmisljali koga dovesti a odrzati isti nivo. Odluka je pala na jos jednu zivu legendu i ovom prilikom vas sa ponosom pozivamo na koncert:

SABANA SAULICA 
13-og Aprila 2014,
u koncertnoj sali "Salsa Room" u Arlington-u na adresi: 
2619 Columbia Pike, Arlington VA 22204

Vrata sale ce se otvoriti u 20 casova kada cemo i krenuti sa nasim programom i pred-pevacima, koji ce nas uvesti u jedno pravo narodnjacko vece dok zvezda veceri ne stupi na scenu.

Ulaznice su pustene u pretprodaju po ceni od $40 (cash only) u prodavnicama:

Euro Foods International
5900 N Kings Hwy, 
Alexandria, VA 22303
703-317-9133,

Euro Mart of Rockville
822-C Rockville Pike, 
Rockville, MD 20582

Karte ce biti povucene iz pretprodaje u subotu 12-og aprila i karte ce ponovo moci da se kupe i na ulazu na vece event-a po ceni od $50.
Karte se nece prodavati putem interneta:(.

Molimo vas da na ulazu OBAVEZNO imate picture ID sa sobom jer su u VA jako striktni po pitanju ovoga i necemo moci nikako da vam pomognemo da udjete u suprotnom.
Ulaz naravno 21 and up only:(

Salsa Room je koncertni Venue koji prima do 800 ljudi tako da ce imati dovoljno mesta za sve nas:). Sam interijer je organizovan tako da ne postoji mesto u lokalu sa kog bina tj. Saban nece moci da se vidi!
Sa leve strane samog objekta gledano sa ulice je veliki parking sa nekih 50 mesta za parkiranje koji mozete da koristite (budite pazljivi jer je par mesta oznaceno za CVS koji je pored i nemojte ostaviti auto ovde). Inace kako je ovo nedelja vece moci cete bez ikakvog problema da parkirate i bilo gde u okolnim ulicama.

Salsa Room ce takodje biti otvoreni za hranu ako iko bude bio zaiteresovan. Kako po samom imenu mesta mozete da pretpostavite da su vlasnici iz Juzne Amerike tako je i available menu sa ovih prostora, nema cevapa:(. Ocekujte: Espanadas (chorizo, beef, chicken), Buffalo Wings, Quesadilla’s (steak, chicken, carnitas), Fish Taco’s…

Sto se tice stolova, kako je Salsa Room lociran u VA, po zakonu nece moci da se sluzi Bottle Service zestokih pica. Jedine flase koje ce moci da se naruju su vina i sampanjac.
Stolove mozete rezervisati putem telefona i minimum za potrositi ce biti $200(+taxe) na barskim i $400(+taxe) za sedece regularne stolove. Na pocetku veceri cete samo morati da ostavite jedan ID i kreditnu karticu (koja nece biti charged, vac zadrzana zbog garancije), a na kraju veceri cete moci da odlucite kako da platite ceh i dobiti kartice nazad. Bez obzira na rezervaciju stolova ulaznice se moraju platiti.
Stolovi se mogu dobiti samo putem rezervacije, na vece koncerta ako bude neki sto ostao slobodan bice dat na principu “first come first serve”.
Reservacije stolova vaze samo do 09:30PM. Molimo sve rezervacije da dodju do tog vremena, jer ce se u suprotnom stolovi dati drugim musterijama.

Za sve ostale informacije i rezervacije kontakt telefoni:
571 332 1160 Igor i 571 355 5195 Marko

Osecajte se slobodno da prosledite ovaj event svim prijateljima za koje mislite da bi bili zainteresovani da dodju:)
Vidimo se uskoro
Vas BalkanNights



BalkanNights proudly presents concert of one of the biggest performers from Balkan: 

SABAN SAULIC

Sunday April 13th, 2014 at concert venue: 
Salsa Room, 
2619 Columbia Pike, Arlington VA 22204

Door will open at 8pm when we will start our program with performers that will worm up atmosphere until Saban Saulic come on stage.

You are able to purchase your tickets at the stores:

Euro Foods International
5900 N Kings Hwy, 
Alexandria VA 22303
703-317-9133

Euro Mart of Rockville
822-C Rockville Pike, 
Rockville, MD 20582

Tickets price will be $40 until April 12th, when sale places will be closed. You will be able to purchase tickets again on the night of event at the door. Price at the door will be $50.

On the entry please have your picture ID with you since other way you will not be able to attend the concert. Unfortunately we will not be able to let anyone younger than 21 to the event. 

Salsa Room is concert venue with limit of 800 people so we expect to have enough space for all of us.
Next to the building (left side looking from the street) is parking lot with around 50 parking spots where you will be able to park. Please don’t use few spots that are market for use of CVS next to it.
Salsa Room will have open kitchen, so all of you that would like to try some of South American specials as Espanadas (chorizo, beef, chicken), Buffalo Wings, Quesadilla’s (steak, chicken, carnitas), Fish Taco’s…, will be able to.

Since Venue is located in VA, according to law we are not able to have bottle service (liquor bottle service). Vines and champagnes are still possible to get at the tables.
You can reserve your tables by phone, and tables will be with $200 min to spend on bar tables and $400 min on boot tables. Reservations will be hold until 9:30PM only, after that will be given to another customer. 

All other info and reservations: 571 332 1160 Igor and 571 355 5195 Marko

Please feel free to share this email with all your friends that may be interested about the event.
See you soon

1454289508128021.description:
TO:  Patriots (black, white, male, female, civilian, military, truckers, bikers, militias, veterans, old, young, every American that loves freedom and liberty)

Mission: Restoration of Constitutional government, rule of law, freedom, liberty "of the people, for the people, by the people" from despotic and tyrannical federal leadership.

Assumptions:
Millions of Americans will participate.
American veterans and patriots are energized to end the tyranny, lawlessness, and shredding of the US Constitution.
Government is not the target, it is sound; corrupt and criminal leadership must be removed.
Those in power will not hesitate to use force against unarmed, peaceful patriots exercising their constitutional rights.
Patriots may be killed, wounded, incarcerated.
There is no hope given today’s technology of secrecy for the effort nor do we want it secret.

Concept of Operations:
Phase 1 - Field millions, as many as ten million, patriots who will assemble in a peaceful, non-violent, physically unarmed (Spiritually/Constitutionally armed), display of unswerving loyalty to the US Constitution and against the incumbent government leadership, in Washington, D.C., with the mission to bring down the existing leadership. Go full-bore, no looking back, steadfast in the mission.

Phase 2 - One million or more of the assembled 10 million must be prepared to stay in D.C. as long as it takes to see Obama, Biden, Reid, McConnell, Boehner, Pelosi, and Attorney General Holder removed from office. The senior republican in the US House of Representatives will become Speaker of the House and the US House of Representatives will elect a temporary President and Vice President of the United States. The U.S. Senate will take action to elect a new majority and minority leader.
As required, the U.S. Congress will execute appropriate legislation to convene new elections or U.S. States will appoint replacements for positions vacated consistent with established constitutional requirements.

Phase 3 – Those with the principles of a West, Cruz, Dr. Ben Carson, Lee, DeMint, Paul, Gov Walker, Sessions, Gowdy, Jordan, will comprise a tribunal and assume positions of authority to convene investigations, recommend appropriate charges against politicians and government employees to the new U.S. Attorney General appointed by the new President.

*All actions in Phase 2 & 3 will be consistent with the U.S. Constitution.

Date of Operation: “OPERATION AMERICAN SPRING – Beginning Of Tyranny Housecleaning, May 16, 2014, completion to be determined

We are past the point of no return, thus must move forward with an effort to save our nation, as there is no other choice. We are asking, pleading with you, and any others that have resources, national voices, email lists, blogs, FB, Twitter, to call for a non-violent American Spring May 16 2014 in Washington D.C. We must appeal to ten million and more American patriots to come and stay in Washington, D.C. to stop the White House and Congress from total destruction of the United States. It’s now or never. God help us.

.....the law of nature rules. A fluffy, cuddly lamb gets eaten by a mean old wolf is not an illegal or immoral event...the law of nature. When some greedy, self-serving occupant of the White House or Congress, or elements outside America, is threatening our existence, our freedom, our liberty, our Constitution, our life resources, our America, then we fight back to destroy the threat and there is nothing immoral or illegal about it. When the government becomes lawless, then "we the people" no longer are obligated to follow the government......there is no law when government picks and chooses for political purposes or personal agenda. At this time the government is performing as a lawless entity......

A duck cannot be turned into a fox; an elephant cannot be turned into a flea; the laws of nature will not permit.
Likewise, a nation ordained and principled by the laws of nature, sovereign, free, with liberty for all cannot naturally become a nation guided by royalty, decrees, tyranny, elitist, self-serving criminals. The former has proven desirable, the latter has proven human pain.
“We can become a nation guided by royalty IF "we the people" beguiled by the government in surrender to our lusts for that which we have not earned --for what is not natural --if we have become intoxicated by unbroken success" as Lincoln proclaimed in March 30 ,1863 call for fasting, humiliation, and prayer--we can very easily heap to ourselves leaders, and with itching ears, be turned from the Truth to become enslaved by the LIE.”
The United States of America (elephant) while embracing the "LIE" is teetering on the abyss of becoming a sniveling, blood sucking, undesirable nation (flea).

OPERATION AMERICAN SPRING will be a gigantic step in removing the flea infestation that is sucking the blood out of America.

We see no reasonable, hopeful sign that indicates there are honorable, loyal, mature, critical thinking, experienced people in government that understands the chaos about to rain down on America, nor do they care....our only hope is that "we the people" call, organize, and draw a few million patriots to stay in D.C. for an "American Spring". It would be the catalyst to draw the line and bring to a conclusion a decision on the out of control government, one way or the other. America will rise up or surrender.........for me, I only go to my knees in the presence of God Almighty...........my knees will not touch the surface as a result of some piss ant occupant of the White House or a corrupt legislator, or outside element...I will fall to my death standing if necessary.

http://patriotsforamerica.ning.com/forum/topics/purging-senior-military-officers-ncos-martial-law-in-the-not?xg_source=activity

http://patriotsforamerica.ning.com/forum/topics/any-doubt-an-american-spring-is-needed

http://patriotsforamerica.ning.com/forum/topics/the-uber-presidency-by-general-paul-vallely

There is not much time and the only planning necessary is to select a starting date, which we have done, and then show up in Washington, D.C. on that date, and plan to stay for the duration. The goal is restoring the US Constitution as the law of the land, removing the lawless leadership. Will this be a cake-walk? No, it will be painful, and some people may die because the government will not be non-violent; some of us will end up in a cell, and some may be injured. If that’s what it will take to save our nation, do we have any choice? Freedom loving Americans will say there is no choice, we must begin the second American Revolution. Not with guns, but with millions of Americans demanding a return to constitutional government and the resignation of Obama, Biden, Reid, McConnell, Boehner, Pelosi, and Holder as a start...then the constitutional restoration process can begin. An AMERICAN SPRING can be avoided only if the above mentioned officials resign.

Will our national patriot leaders step forward and declare, “send me”, I’ll lead? There are millions of veterans and patriots ready to follow and have said “I will go”.

I urge all organizations, groups, particularly veterans and military retirees begin planning to visit Washington, D.C beginning May 16, 2014. Keep tuned to Constitutional Emergency/Patriots for America www.patriotsforamerica.ning.com for updates and guidance.

Please bathe this effort in prayer as there is no personal agenda or gain save liberty, freedom, and restoration of constitutional government for "we the people".

Harry Riley, COL, USA, Ret

1456966281202330.description:
Reşat Nuri Güntekin’in ölümsüz eseri "Çalıkuşu" romanının tiyatro yorumu 20 Nisan'da başkent Vaşington’da sahnelenecek. Vaşington Türk Amerikan Derneği (ATA-DC) işbirliğinde seyirci ile buluşacak tiyatro gösterisinde, Feride'yi canlandıran Dilek Aba, 1920'lerde bir kadının İstanbul'dan Anadolu'ya uzanan mücadele dolu yaşamındaki evrelerini ve bunların Feride'nin kimliğinde Türk kadınına yansımasını aktaracak. 

Feride'nin ölümsüz aşkı Kamran'ı ise Ali Ozan Akin oynuyor. İpek Kadılar'ın oyunlaştırdığı, İbrahim Yazıcı'nn sahneye koyduğu "Çalıkuşu"nda 1920'lerin Türkiye'sinde feminizm olgusu üzerinde duruluyor.

Romanda, iyi öğrenim görmüş bir İstanbul kızının, Anadolu'nun çeşitli köy ve kasabalarında öğretmen olarak yaşadığı serüven anlatılır. Çalıkuşu duygusal bir sevgi öyküsüdür. Serüven yönü ağır basan bu romanda, kişilerin duygu dünyaları, ülke gerçeklerinden soyutlanmadan verilir. 

Tarih: 20 Nisan Pazar 3 PM – 5 PM

Mekan: Mclean High School

RSVP için rsvp@atadc.org adresine mesaj atmanız rica olunur. 
Bilet Ücretleri:Üyeler $30
Üye Olmayanlar $40
Öğrenci $20

173448449498609.description:
Just Say 'No' to Amnesty! Join with us to "STOP THE GANG OF EIGHT BEFORE THEY SEAL AMERICA'S FATE!"  


FREE Bus transportation being organized in many states.
Please click the 'See more' to view all the event details.

Share this event: https://www.facebook.com/events/173448449498609

Lead Event Organizer: Leah Durant

STATEMENT: We believe it is time that members of Congress act to preserve economic opportunity for American workers - and pass immigration legislation that protects and supports the nearly 22 million American citizens who do not have jobs, or cannot find adequate employment to support their families. Economists report that labor participation in the U.S. is at its lowest rate in over 30 years. Despite sluggish economic conditions, some in Congress have put forth immigration proposals to increase legal immigration levels by 50% and provide amnesty to over 11 million people who have entered the country illegally. We stand against these proposals, as they will result in adding millions more to the U.S. labor force, putting millions of American citizens out of work.

MISSION: We are assembling a coalition of like minded groups and individuals to help to stop Congress' amnesty push. Join the Black American Leadership Alliance and other concerned American citizens for our march on Monday, July 15, 2013 at 9:30 a.m. at Freedom Plaza as we demand that our leaders reject amnesty, and pass immigration policies that put all unemployed Americans citizens back to work.

You can find more info here: http://dcmarchforjobs.com/
We will be adding much more info on the website over the next few days.

You can also like/share our FB page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/DC-March-For-Jobs-Join-A-Bus/383712311734554





Sponsored in part by:  http://teapartycommunity.com 

Confirmed Main Event Speakers:
Senator Ted Cruz
Col. Allen West 
Leah Durant
Congressman Mo Brooks
CL Bryant
Kevin Jackson
KCarl Smith
Frank Morris
Ken Crow
Dennis Michael Lynch 
Senator Elbert Guillory
We are also extending an invitation for Sen. Ted Cruz to speak.

Warm up speakers (staging area):
Jesse Lee Peterson
Brad Botwin 
Reverend Dozier
Bishop Felton Smith
Former INS Agent Michael Cutler
173448449498609.name: DC March For Jobs

178941785644802.description:
Excision 2014 tour dates announced and the return of The Executioner.

Get tickets for Washington DC @ http://smarturl.it/XMar22Tickets

There is truly no sleep for the wicked, as Canadian Dubstep pioneer Excision announces his massive 2014 Tour. Starting this January Excision will hit the road only weeks after wrapping the final string of Destroid live shows for 2013. 

Embracing an unyielding pursuit to push the boundaries of bass music, Excision is continually creating and re-imagining innovative uses of cutting edge technology to impact his fans, as well as the EDM community at large. This 2014 Tour will prove to be his most extensive and most immersive tour experience to date. With an already phenomenal level of production at his disposal, you better believe he has gone even further. He is stepping things up to a whole new level and bringing a monstrous 150,000 watts of sound, which is capable of delivering insanely loud yet crystal clear audio to blast dance floors with room shaking bass in a way that bass music is ultimately designed to be felt as well as heard.

The 2014 tour also marks the return of the 28 foot wide, 15 foot tall mammoth video and lighting installation known as The Executioner. This custom crafted stage production was specifically designed for Excisions 3D video mapped visual sequences as he DJ's both music and video live on stage. The Executioner is fully recharged and returning as Excision’s on-stage bass bunker, complete with brand new 3D visual animations displayed across its 420 square feet of surface area. This technological audio video monstrosity is equipped with various sliding panels and pneumatics to hide lazers, fog machines, an extensively upgraded lighting system and more than a few surprises yet to be revealed.


Dirtyphonics
-
Dirtyphonics, the fabulous french DJ team joins with Excision for his 2014 tour. Bringing their signature style of genre bending madness from DNB, Electro House and everything in between, don't miss a second of their electrifying sets as they set the world on fire!




Ill.Gates 
-
Ill.Gates is a Toronto-based composer, performer and educator. Over the past 16 years, he has established a global fanbase and a reputation as one of the most dynamic electronic music artists around. He regularly tours across North America, Europe, Australia and Asia. Gates has headlined at such festivals as Burning Man, Shambala, the World Electronic Music Festival and the New Orleans Jazz Festival. His first full-length release, Autopirate (Muti Music, 2008) charted and continues to sell strongly. His upcoming triple album The ill.Methodology and accompanying online course are highly anticipated. Gates was recently selected as one of the Next 100 by URB Magazine.

Many of his contemporaries cite ill.Gates as a key artistic influence and inspiration in their music. While on tour, Gates frequently teaches workshops to grateful and attentive audiences, in which he shares his highly effective approach to producing quality finished music as well as insights into the mentality and strategies necessary to succeed in the music business.
178941785644802.name: Excision in Washington DC @ Echostage

179630045581651.description:
The following is copied from the Operation “American Spring” set for May 16, 2014: Target Washington, D.C. FB Event Page as the mission...

Restoration of Constitutional government, rule of law, freedom, liberty “of the people, for the people, by the people” from despotic and tyrannical federal leadership.

Assumptions:

Millions of Americans will participate.

American veterans and patriots are energized to end the tyranny, lawlessness, and shredding of the US Constitution.

Government is not the target, it is sound; corrupt and criminal leadership must be removed.

Those in power will not hesitate to use force against unarmed patriots exercising their constitutional rights.

Patriots may be killed, wounded, incarcerated.

There is no hope given today’s technology of secrecy for the effort nor do we want it secret.

Concept of Operations:

Phase 1 – Field millions, as many as ten million, patriots who will assemble in a non-violent, physically unarmed (Spiritually/Constitutionally armed), display of unswerving loyalty to the US Constitution and against the incumbent government leadership, in Washington, D.C., with the mission to bring down the existing leadership. Go full-bore, no looking back, steadfast in the mission.

Phase 2 – One million or more of the assembled 10 million must be prepared to stay in D.C. as long as it takes to see Obama, Biden, Reid, McConnell, Boehner, Pelosi, and Attorney General Holder removed from office. The senior republican in the US House of Representatives will become Speaker of the House and the US House of Representatives will elect a temporary President and Vice President of the United States. The U.S. Senate will take action to elect a new majority and minority leader.

As required, the U.S. Congress will execute appropriate legislation to convene new elections or U.S. States will appoint replacements for positions vacated consistent with established constitutional requirements.

Phase 3* – Those with the principles of a West, Cruz, Lee, DeMint, Paul, Gov Walker, Sessions, Gowdy, Jordan, Issa, will comprise a tribunal and assume positions of authority to convene investigations, recommend appropriate charges against politicians and government employees to the new U.S. Attorney General appointed by the new President.

*All actions in Phase 2 & 3 will be consistent with the U.S. Constitution.

Date of Operation: “OPERATION AMERICAN SPRING – Beginning Of Tyranny Housecleaning, May 16, 2014, completion to be determined.

We are past the point of no return, thus must move forward with an effort to save our nation, as there is no other choice. We are asking, pleading with you, and any others that have resources, national voices, email lists, blogs, FB, Twitter, to call for a non-violent American Spring on May 16, 2014 in Washington D.C. We must appeal to ten million and more American patriots to come and stay in Washington, D.C. to stop the White House and Congress from total destruction of the United States. It’s now or never. God help us.

The law of nature rules. A fluffy, cuddly lamb gets eaten by a mean old wolf is not an illegal or immoral event…the law of nature. When some greedy, self-serving occupant of the White House or Congress, or elements outside America, is threatening our existence, our freedom, our liberty, our Constitution, our life resources, our America, then we fight back to destroy the threat and there is nothing immoral or illegal about it. When the government becomes lawless, then “we the people” no longer are obligated to follow the government … there is no law when government picks and chooses for political purposes or personal agenda. At this time the government is performing as a lawless entity……

A duck cannot be turned into a fox; an elephant cannot be turned into a flea; the laws of nature will not permit.

Likewise, a nation ordained and principled by the laws of nature, sovereign, free, with liberty for all cannot naturally become a nation guided by royalty, decrees, tyranny, elitist, self-serving criminals. The former has proven desirable, the latter has proven human pain.

“We can become a nation guided by royalty IF “we the people” beguiled by the government in surrender to our lusts for that which we have not earned –for what is not natural –if we have become intoxicated by unbroken success” as Lincoln proclaimed in March 30, 1863 call for fasting, humiliation, and prayer–we can very easily heap to ourselves leaders, and with itching ears, be turned from the Truth to become enslaved by the LIE.”

The United States of America (elephant) while embracing the “LIE” is teetering on the abyss of becoming a sniveling, blood sucking, undesirable nation (flea).

OPERATION AMERICAN SPRING will be a gigantic step in removing the flea infestation that is sucking the blood out of America.

We see no reasonable, hopeful sign that indicates there are honorable, loyal, mature, critical thinking, experienced people in government that understands the chaos about to rain down on America, nor do they care….our only hope is that “we the people” call, organize, and draw a few million patriots to stay in D.C. for an “American Spring”. It would be the catalyst to draw the line and bring to a conclusion a decision on the out of control government, one way or the other. America will rise up or surrender … for me, I only go to my knees in the presence of God Almighty … my knees will not touch the surface as a result of some piss ant occupant of the White House or a corrupt legislator, or outside element … I will fall to my death standing if necessary.

There is not much time and the only planning necessary is to select a starting date, which we will do soon, and then show up in Washington, D.C. on that date, and plan to stay for the duration. The goal is restoring the US Constitution as the law of the land, removing the lawless leadership. Will this be a cake-walk? No, it will be painful, and some people may die because the government will not be non-violent; some of us will end up in a cell, and some may be injured. If that’s what it will take to save our nation, do we have any choice? Freedom loving Americans will say there is no choice, we must begin the second American Revolution. Not with guns, but with millions of Americans demanding a return to constitutional government and the resignation of Obama, Biden, Reid, McConnell, Boehner, Pelosi and Holder as a start … then the constitutional restoration process can begin. An AMERICAN SPRING can be avoided only if the above mentioned officials resign.

Will our national patriot leaders step forward and declare, “send me”, I’ll lead? There are millions of veterans and patriots ready to follow and have said “I will go”.

I urge all organizations, groups, particularly veterans and military retirees begin planning to visit Washington, D.C beginning May 16, 2014. Keep tuned to Constitutional Emergency/Patriots for America www.patriotsforamerica.ning.com for updates and guidance.

'INVITE' and BRING EVERYBODY, to Operation "American Spring" who believes in Saving Our Constitution, Our free and sovereign STATES and The Republic by restoring the Rule of our Ninth and Tenth Amendment Supreme Laws of The Land, which limit them to only the eighteen powers and spending granted them as itemized under Article I Section 8 of OUR Constitution, UPON our elected and wannabe elected Republican and Democrat enemies of OUR Bill of Rights. Bring our Rights, wages and salaries back home to our States and the people, which have been incrementally usurped by our elected Republican and Democrat despots since the 1913 Trifecta of Tyranny and Treason.

Please bathe this effort in prayer as there is no personal agenda or gain save liberty, freedom, and restoration of constitutional government for “we the people”.

There are several organizations, in addition to this fb Event, organizing Operation "American Spring".

RELATED COLUMNS:

http://patriotsforamerica.ning.com/forum/topics/purging-senior-military-officers-ncos-martial-law-in-the-not?xg_source=activity

http://patriotsforamerica.ning.com/forum/topics/any-doubt-an-americ…

http://patriotsforamerica.ning.com/forum/topics/the-uber-presidency…

183889578486707.description:
The Thirteen is an elite ensemble of twelve  professional singers, specializing in music of the  Renaissance and Baroque. Based in the New York  area, The Thirteen performs throughout the  mid-Atlantic and has a national reach through  recordings and touring. The Thirteen is committed to historically informed  performance, often performing infrequently  performed works of the Renaissance and  Baroque. Praised for their "...great sensitivity to  style and nuance..." The Thirteen's  recording "...to St. Cecilia" was recently submitted for a Grammy in the 2014 Grammy Year.

Join one of America's finest choral ensembles in a concert featuring Robert White's "Lamentations of Jeremiah," Giacomo Carissimi's "Jepthe" and more! Join us in the lush acoustic of Bradley Hills Presbyterian Church and allow yourself to be transported into another world. 

Suggested donation: $20, $15 for students and seniors. Ample parking available. The concert is followed by a free reception.
183889578486707.name: The professional chamber choir The Thirteen in Concert in the Washington DC Area

184839145038461.description:
DAMAGED CITY FEST 2014

_________________________________
 
Damaged City Fest is a celebration of hardcore punk in the nation’s capital. The second annual event will occur on April 11th-13th, 2014. 
 
The two main shows will be held in Washington, D.C.’s longstanding DIY venue, St. Stephen’s Church. The historic venue has been hosting punk shows in the city since the 80’s and offers intimacy, energy, and a perfectly sized stage. The church is conveniently located close to a Metro train station and is easy to access from anywhere in the Metropolitan area. 

After each of the main shows at St. Stephens Church on Friday and Saturday, there will be an after show within walking distance at a bar called The Pinch. There are no advanced tickets available for these, and will only cost $5 at the door. There will also be a matinee show/record swap on Sunday at the Dance Institute of Washington.
 
ALL SHOWS ARE ALL AGES!

212938432238389.description:
It's that time again! International Pillow Fight Day 2014 will be on April 5th, 2014 at 2PM on the Washington Monument!

Just like last year, we will be meeting at the Washington Monument, on the rectangular plot of grass facing the World War 2 Memorial.

Our rules have remain unchanged:

+ Please note while our event has evolved over the years, we still ask that we retain the "prank" aspect of the pillow fight, and try to hide our pillows as we arrive at The National Mall. If you can't hide it, come up with a clever answer as to why you're carrying a pillow around (wanted to take a nap while out, it's the chic thing to do and that's why everyone else here is doing it, etc.)

+ Wait until the signal to begin (you'll know when we start).

+ The event is free and appropriate for all ages. BUT...

+ Please swing pillows lightly! Of all events we ever have, this one has the most children involved, so please be mindful who you're swinging at!

+ It is recommended that children play outside the main pillow crowd.

+ Do not swing at people without pillows or with cameras. 

+ Remove glasses beforehand! 

+ We encourage participants to leave down pillows at home. The less that pillows burst, the easier the clean up.

We're very excited, as this is our 6th year sponsoring this yearly pillow fight, and it has grown into the thousands! Please spread the word, and remember... have fun!
212938432238389.name: International Pillow Fight Day 2014 - Washington, DC

218094658387258.description:
Dear Friends,
As many of you know, according to our ancient national traditions, the New Year is knocking on our doors - the early days of Spring, heralding a resurrection of nature, a new beginning, a new page in the book of our lives. We call it "the new day" - Navruz!
Tickets are up for sale! It is only $49.99 per person!
Guests under 16 years of age will be accommodated free of charge.
After 19th March tickets will be 65$, so please, make your online purchases in advance.
We are happy to announce the annual celebration of Navruz in Washington, D.C. We invite you all to become a part of a joyful gathering, taste delicious gems of Tajik Cuisine, experience warm friendship, explore a fascinating art exhibition and enjoy the musical performance of a renowned singer in Tajikistan and beyond - Jonibek Murodov. Navruz has become a global tradition and a universal celebration, so everybody is welcome to join and share this joy with us!!!
218094658387258.name: Navruz in Washington D.C. with Jonibek Murodov

218419481687303.description:
TAC 1,2 - BEGINNERS PISTOL
Objective: designed especially for beginners with limited or no experience. We start with the basic fundamentals, including: safety, semi-auto mechanism, how to aim with the sights, trigger work and practice our special aiming techniques also known as the Israeli "point-shooting". This allows even a beginner to shoot without missing and without using the sights. To read more about the point-shooting technique, please go to ABOUT US TAB. In this course we also combines TAC 2 subjects such as mags change, position change, dealing with multipile attackers, use a cover and other tactical items.
 
COURSE LOCATION IN MARYLAND
PSTA Professional Indoor Facility
6101 Fallard Drive Upper Marlboro, MD 20772 ( press on the link to see direction and map )
 
OUR NEXT EVENT 
We close the RSVP list a week before the course and we don't except last minute RSVP's due to logistics reasons, please reserve your spot today!

3/2/2014   9:00AM-2:00PM    

4/6/2014   9:00AM-2:00PM

PRICE
COURSE COST: $250 + OPTIONAL EXTRA CHARGE ( GUN + AMMO + EQUIPMENT )  ( special winter promotion price )
The regular Price for that course is $400

GEAR
we provide all the gear, but we recommend you bring your own gear.
 

    Hand gun - semi Automatic - ( in the range and in the service we use Glock 19 9mm ) + 3 mags
    Gun Holster - we are teaching the Israeli concealed point shooting technique and you will need a holster during all classes and in real life as well.
    Magazine pouch - with room for at least minimum 2 magazines
    Knee protection shield - It just makes practice more comfortable and safe - you need only one knee protection.
    Comfortable pants and a thick leather belt to hold the holster on your waist using the pants belt.
    Shoes - Comfortable shoes you can walking and running in with no heels.
    Jacket - light and comfortable for the concealed shooting technique practice ( from class 2 & up )
    Safety gear - eyes and ears protection.

219536981566088.description:
There's no better time to be in DC than late April, specifically the 25-27th, 2014.  With six bands from New Orleans, New York, Pittsburgh and right here in DC, our world class lindy exchange enters its "teen years."  It's packed with with live music each afternoon, evening, and late night dance -- enough excitement to keep you jazzed up all weekend long!

Get lucky and win a Smoking Time Jazz Club CD if you register in the month of February; we'll do a drawing for a winner at the end of the month.  

Do you know what it means to dance in New Orleans? One band that you may have heard performing on Frenchman Street is the Smoking Time Jazz Club. They're bringing their big brassy rhythms to both Friday AND Saturday of DCLX. Also from the Big Easy, jazz superstar Aurora Nealand will be joining Craig Gildner's Big Band, a DC favorite, after recently playing together during the New Year's Eve dance at Lindy Focus.  Plus we have the amazing Gordon Webster from New York, the crowd-pleasing Boilermaker Jazz Band from Pittsburgh, and live, local music in the afternoons. It will be a weekend full of Epic Lindy Awesome! You won't want to miss it.

It really is an all-star line up, and we'll be announcing the DJs soon!

Register now at:
http://www.dclx.org/exchange/dclx-2014

$75 for now 
$80 after March 15th

Want to shave some of that off? Email us at dclx.volunteers@gmail.com to get on the volunteer list!

221717538001587.description:
Hello, Jeffrey here!

	I’m writing to you to tell you that I have an amazing opportunity: a trip to Washington, D.C. and New York City! In this 8th grade school trip, I will have the chance to see the Washington Memorial, along with the WWII and the Lincoln Memorials. Also, I’ll fly in a plane for my first time EVER, and stay in a quality New York hotel. On top of that, I’ll get to see a Broadway Show, the sights and sounds of New York, and even the Statue of Liberty!!! WOW! So excited!! This trip will take place the week after school gets out in June.

	However, I cannot do this alone. The total cost for the trip comes to $2,500. That’s why my family and I are starting a fundraiser. We need to pay $150 a month, with the remainder due in March, so the money has to come in soon. If you live close by, I am willing to work for you to get the money. However, if you live farther away, like in Chico, then please donate what you can.  All donations will go directly to funding this spectacular opportunity.

So, remember,

DON’T BE A DORK,
HELP JEFF TO NEW YORK!

(and D.C.)
 
Cheers!
-Jeffrey Sanchez
221717538001587.name: Help Send Jeffrey to Washington D.C. and New York City!!!

225976587597748.description:
RSVP for free via Eventbrite:
http://404day.eventbrite.com/?aff=efbevent

Two decades ago Congress began publishing on the Internet, revolutionizing public access to legislative information. While the technology we use has evolved since the 90s, Congress has not always kept up.

In the meantime, public-minded entrepreneurs have used congressional data to alert people to important bills, keep track of votes, and put citizens in contact with their elected representatives.

While some modernization has occurred, further improvements to Congress’s publishing methods are urgently needed. And with the looming switch from THOMAS to Congress.gov, many organizations and individuals who depend on the available data will be left in the dark, endangering the public’s ability see what its government is doing.

Join our panel of data experts for a discussion of how far we have come, and how far we have yet to go, to fulfill the promise of lawmaking in the open.

 

Keep the conversation going at our evening reception: http://404reception.eventbrite.com

 

Featuring:

Jim Harper, Global Policy Counsel, Bitcoin Foundation; Senior Fellow, Cato Institute (Moderator)

Steve Dwyer, Digital Director & Policy Advisor to Rep. Steny Hoyer

Josh Tauberer, Founder, Govtrack.Us

Nick Schaper, Senior Vice President, Engage

Kirsten Gullickson, Senior Systems Analyst, Clerk of the House of Representatives

 

Learn more about the coalition: www.congressionaldata.org 

Hill credentials are not a requirement for attendance. This event is sponsored by the R Street Institute and CREW, as well as other members of the Congressional Data Coalition.
225976587597748.location: Longworth House Office Building, Room 1310 , Washington, DC, US
225976587597748.name: 4/04 Day: Lawmaking in the Open

226139807553184.description:
Please join us Friday, Dec 5th for one of DC's Greatest New Traditions...  

The 3nd Annual DC Krampusnacht!

With the holidays now upon us, we're all familiar w/ the story of Santa Claus. But according to ancient lore, St. Nicholas actually had several attendants, one of which was the horned satyr Krampus. Whereas St. Nick would reward good little girls & boys, Krampus would punish the bad kids. For 'truly' bad children, he'd even carry them off to later be devoured as his X-mas dinner!  

Traditionally, Kampsuslauf takes place on Dec 5th (day before St. Nicholas Day). Celebratory revelers parade through the night, carousing their way through the streets & warn attendant children to be nice. 

In a city known for its cultural diversity & multinational intrigue, this year we're proud to host the 3rd Annual Kampuslauf on H Street. With a schedule of events that run throughout the evening, Kampusnacht offers a little something for everyone - perfect for families & revelers alike!  


- For a more detailed history see Wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Krampus 
- For an idea as to the Krampuslauf Tradition see: www.youtube.com/watch?v=WLnl5ZWG4tg 

All parties are welcome to join in the fun! Full or partial participation is DEEPLY encouraged.  For the parade, any reasonable attempt for authentic costumes (professional or amateur) shall be openly welcome.

 To join the parade, costumes are required - join our group to participate! https://www.facebook.com/groups/krampusnachtdc/

All efforts go to benefit 'Santa's Cause DC' (https://www.facebook.com/SantasCauseDc): a special project for "Family Matters of Washington, DC" - striving to enhance the lives of foster children throughout the DC area, they provide a program for personalized gifts both during the December holidays (delivered by Santa himself) as well as on birthdays. In addition, they provide needed supplies for the entire school year. We will be accepting unwrapped toys & monetary donations to benefit this most worthy cause. 

So bring your family or friends & kick off the holidays with a fun filled evening for all! No Doubt, THIS is a night you won't want to miss!
226139807553184.name: KRAMPUSNACHT DC 2014

237173636406962.description:
On March 31 and April 1, 2014, Tibetan-Americans and friends of Tibet are invited to Washington, DC for the Sixth Annual Tibet Lobby Day.

Sign Up Deadline: Friday, March 21, 2014

SIGN UP TODAY: http://action.savetibet.org/p/salsa/web/questionnaire/public/?questionnaire_KEY=716&killorg=True 

The success of Tibet Lobby Day depends on the participation and efforts of Tibet supporters like you. It is your opportunity to communicate directly with your elected representatives and let them know that they have constituents who care deeply about Tibet.

The U.S. Congress has long been a bulwark of support for Tibet, from giving His Holiness the Dalai Lama his first parliamentary forum in 1987, to millions of dollars in Tibet support programs every year. But at the same time it is of vital importance that we continue to remind our Members of Congress of their longstanding commitment to Tibet. Faced with the well-funded lobbying might of the Chinese Embassy, it is critical that we speak out to let our elected representatives know of the breadth and depth of support for the cause of Tibet amongst their constituents and ensure that Tibet continues to remain on their legislative agendas.

This event is a collaboration of U.S.-based Tibet Support Groups, and Tibetan Associations in the United States. The International Campaign for Tibet (ICT) will provide a lobbying training session, help set up meetings for all participants with their Members of Congress.

For more information, please contact your local Tibet group or contact ICT advocacy team at lobbyday@savetibet.org or ICT at (202) 785-1515.
237173636406962.name: Tibet Lobby Day 2014 in Washington DC
